# Diamonds

This document will examine the nature of diamond **pricing**, **availability**, and **purity** and much more.

## Price Relative to Carats

```{r , echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(data = diamonds) + geom_point(aes(x= price, y= carat)) + geom_smooth(aes(x=price, y=carat))
```

## Common Colors

```{r , echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
ggplot(data = diamonds) +
  geom_bar( aes(color, fill = color))
```
